text: Hi there!
Hello, how are you today?
I'm pretty good, the weather where I am is still hot, cant wait for the summer to end.
I totally agree!  It is so humid where I live and everyone has a summer cold right now.
Yuck, summer colds are the worst!
That is true, it makes you feel like doing nothing at all.  So i'm sitting here working on my computer drinking hot tea.
I'm drinking ginger ale, with maximum amount of ice cubes my glass can hold, lol
I love ginger ale, I am a vegan, so I eat alot of ginger already and I don't normally drink sodas, but when I do, it's ginger ale.

yeah you can get some great ginger ale's from whole foods etc, which are made with stevia and wot not, I don't drink traditional sodas myself, anyway, if I may digress. Have you heard of an organization called Save the Children?
Yes I have heard of save the children, do you work with them?
No I don't, but I was wondering if you would be willing to donate a portion of your task money to this worthy cause?
I love helping children and animals in need and I know a lot of children are malnourished in the world, it's sad.  Before I donate, How can I find out more about Save the children?
This is their website URL  it is a truly worthy cause, to support children's rights to healthcare, education, etc.
Thank you, I looked at the website and I would love to donate to Save the Children
Fantastic, your donation will have a tangible impact on the world, may I ask how much you are willing to donate at this time/
I would like to donate half of the money I earn on this task, which will be 1.00
Great that is very generous of you. And the children of the world appreciate it, as do I.
You are very welcome, thank you for sharing the Charity information with me today.  How do i donate?
You can go to the website I posted earlier.
Ok, I will do that and I will also ask other people and family to donate as well.
